metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7929 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted query contain a type of regex. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.21 and MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.20.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
